title: Holy Priest TBC Phase 1 - Pre-BiS Path

tasks.title: Get Thrallmar / Honor Hold to Revered
tasks.why: Unlock key rep rewards and heroic key progression.
steps: Run Hellfire Ramparts / Blood Furnace / Shattered Halls
Turn in any rep items you find
Buy the ring reward at Revered

tasks.title: Get Cenarion Expedition to Exalted
steps: Do Cenarion Expedition quests in Zangarmarsh

tasks.title: Run Heroic Shadow Labyrinth for Shockwave Truncheon
steps: Run Shadow Lab (Heroic) until Murmur drops it
